tsRNN 0.1.4
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

DT_apple

Quarterly reported EBIT from Apple as data.table object from 1995 to 2020.

DT_unh

Quarterly reported EBIT from UNH as data.table object from 1995 to 2020.

add_diffs()

Add differences to time series data.table object for specified columns

add_growth_rates()

Add growth rates to time series data.table object for specified columns

add_shift()

Add shifts to time series data.table object for specified columns

check_acf()

Check for autocorrelation

dow30

US index Dow Jones 30 quarterly cashflow data from 1990 to 2020.

dow30_clean

US index Dow Jones 30 quarterly EBIT from 1990 to 2020, cleaned by missing data and outliers

dropout_predict()

predict for keras models

fc_arima

Univaritate time series with actual datapoints and ARIMA forecast (data.table object)

fc_baseline

Baseline Forecast (data.table object) with SNAIVE and Holt's Trend

forecast_baseline()

baseline models to get benchmark results for advanced models

keras_rnn()

Train Recurrent Neural Network with Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU) or Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM) using Keras framework

acd() smis()

Prediction Interval (PI) Accuracy Measures

mase() mape() smape()

Point Forecast Accuracy Measures

plot_baselines()

Plot Forecasts by baseline methods

plot_baselines_samples()

Plot cross validated samples of forecasts by baseline methods

plot_prediction()

Plot timeseries and forecast for single split and company

plot_prediction_samples()

Plot multiple splits from list with forecast results

predict_arima()

Forecast the next n steps by ARIMA for each split

predict_baselines()

Prediction and evaluation for baseline models including cross validation

py_dropout_model()

Change dropout rate in recurrent layer or dropout layer of trained model

ts_apple

Quarterly reported EBIT from Apple as ts object from 1995 to 2020.

ts_nn_preparation()

Timeseries data preparation for neural network Keras models

ts_normalization()

Normalize univariate timeseries

ts_unh

Quarterly reported EBIT from UNH as ts object from 1995 to 2020.

tune_keras_rnn_bayesoptim()

Tune recurrent neural network with Keras functional API and Bayes Optimization to select best performing model

tune_keras_rnn_eval()

Evaluate (tuned) recurrent neural networks per split/sample

tune_keras_rnn_predict()

Use tuned recurrent neural network parameters with Keras functional API and to train best performing model(s) and forecast

Contents

Developed by Thomas Fuchs.
